properties.areaDesc: Wyoming Black Hills; Northern Black Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 2:06PM MST until January 2 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...ACCUMULATING SNOW LATE TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY MORNING...

.An upper level disturbance will support a period of moderate
upslope snow late tonight into Thursday. Total snow accumulations
of 3 to 6 inches are expected with the highest amounts from Four
Corners to just southwest of Lead. Much lesser amounts of an inch
or less can be expected around Beulah to Aladdin.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. In South Dakota,
the Northern Black Hills.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow amounts will be highly terrain
influenced, with the the highest amounts from Four Corners to
just southwest of Lead. Much lesser amounts can be expected from
around Beulah to Aladdin in Wyoming, and from Brownsville to
Nemo in South Dakota.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY
